lead_paragraph: Kent Bazemore scored 14 points and Al Horford had 13 points and tied a season high with 16 rebounds to help the Atlanta Hawks beat the Charlotte Hornets 87-76 on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Bazemore, Horford Propel Hawks Past Hornets
headline.main: Bazemore, Horford Propel Hawks Past Hornets

snippet: Kent Bazemore scored 14 points and Al Horford had 13 points and tied a season high with 16 rebounds to help the Atlanta Hawks beat the Charlotte Hornets 87-76 on Sunday....
